description:
Williams Newman Williams, PLLC, is a Jackson, Mississippi, personal injury law firm. We have recovered millions of dollars on behalf of our clients, and we are always ready to apply our knowledge and experience to a challenging new case.

Personal Injury Focus

Our attorneys have dedicated their careers to personal injury law. Some of them have always represented injured people, while others have defended insurance companies.

That means we have the perspective of being on both sides of these cases. We know the motivations of the other side, and we are in an excellent position to predict their strategies.

Multiple Practice Areas

Our law firm handles different types of personal injury cases. These types include motor vehicle accidents, including commercial truck accidents; nursing home abuse and elder abuse; toxic torts; toxic mold; animal bites; aviation accidents; wrongful death; medical malpractice; construction accidents; birth injury; brain injury and premises liability. Further information about these and other practice areas is available upon request.

Tenacious Representatives

We have a complete commitment to protecting the rights and interests of clients of our law firm. We have experience at trial, and we are ready to go all the way if we do not believe that our client is getting a fair deal. Williams Newman Williams, PLLC, offers free consultations, accepts credit cards and provides virtual appointment options.
